backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing habit CRUD, critical habit limits, scoring logic, and image blob storage integration.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata linking implemented features to source files, components, and test IDs for gallery sizing and image scaling.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON mapping of frontend files to high-level descriptions used for build and feature planning.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document mounting the React app and loading the main entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component coordinating header, category selection, habit list, dialogs, gallery, and global layout.
frontend/src/components/AddHabitButton.t: Floating action button that opens the Add Habit dialog.
frontend/src/components/AddHabitDialog.t: Form dialog for creating a new habit with ratings, critical toggle enforcement, and category selection.
frontend/src/components/CategoryToggle.t: Two-button segmented switch for selecting between Performance and Aesthetics categories.
frontend/src/components/DeleteHabitDialo: Confirmation dialog for deleting a habit with loading feedback.
Form dialog for editing an existing habit with pre-filled values and critical limit validation.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with attribution text and link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/GalleryButton.ts: Floating button with eye icon used to open the photo gallery dialog.
frontend/src/components/HabitCard.tsx: Expandable card showing habit details, score tier, and edit/delete dialogs.
frontend/src/components/HabitList.tsx: Fetches habits for a category and renders them as a ranked list of HabitCards.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Editable header component that loads, displays, and saves a custom title.
frontend/src/components/PhotoGallery.tsx: Modal photo gallery with image upload, carousel navigation, and delete functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor, handling identity changes and access control initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, login/logout handling, and persistent identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for habits and gallery operations using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers, color variables, typography, and custom utility/component classes for tiers and critical habit styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, including logic for hash‑based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom color tokens, themes, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, and a pending feature request focused on fixing the image viewer’s sizing and proportional scaling behavior.
